website_summaries.verdict: Effective wash that doesn't leave behind any residue or strange taste on produce.
pros: USDA has certified this fruit and vegetable wash to be organic and kosher
Product will last a long time without spoiling
Successfully removes unwanted contaminants on the surface of produce with an easy-to-use spray
cons: Occasional problems with quality control, as the bottles may arrive broken

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Veggie Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A grapefruit juice based vegetable cleaner that works perfectly for rinsing chemicals/pesticides off fruit/veggies. Typically, I use this first, then rinse it off with water afterwards. Our local grocery store discontinued this item, so we bought up as much as we had space for. An indispensable product if you regularly purchase fresh veggies/fruit...
customer_reviews.author: Dave Marsh

customer_reviews.title: I am very pro homemade products but even Vinegar solution doesn't do the trick like this product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time. I am very pro homemade products but even Vinegar solution doesn't do the trick like this product. Local grocery quit carrying so I was pleased to find it. My fresh vegetables and fruits keep longer using FIT.
customer_reviews.author: AMc

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This advertises it is a pack of 6 bottles — IT IS NOT. I received only one, individually wrapped bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Great for fruit and vegetables
customer_reviews.text: This product is an essential part of everyday cooking. I first bought just one of this product and I loved it so, I bought a set of it again. I spray this organic detergent generously when I wash vegetables and fruits. It's about to run out too. I'm going to order more of the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Chestnuts

customer_reviews.title: Organic
customer_reviews.text: We don’t eat fruit or veggies without 1st using FIT. It does a great jump and a staple in our home
customer_reviews.author: Rayerrica

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price, especially considering it was delivered!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly as described. $1.50 per bottle, you can’t go wrong. Fit is my favorite veggie wash. Not too powerful, not too weak, just right for gently cleaning your produce.
customer_reviews.author: L Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love this product to wash my produce !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product to wash my produce ! And now in time of corona Virus more so ...👏👏👏
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Eisen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no aftertaste.
customer_reviews.text: I've used a competitor's brand for years. Fit is easy to use, cleans veggies and fruits quickly and doesn't leave an aftertaste like other brands.Will definitely keep purchasing this brand.
customer_reviews.author: J Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It cleans fruits and vegetables well and leaves no aftertaste. Can't find it consistently locally so glad it's available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: shannon a

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the others
customer_reviews.text: It's the only brand we use. Much better than the others. Wishes right off with no after-taste or flavor. This is the best price we've found.

customer_reviews.title: Used this for years and can always tell a difference ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years and can always tell a difference in the produce. Who wants to eat the waxy coating? not me!

customer_reviews.title: Produce Wash
customer_reviews.text: So glad to see this back! Cleans fruit and veggies and makes them edible. I love this product!

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but giving a low rating due to shipping - one of the bottles was busted and product leaked in the box, bottom of box soaked and falling apart.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this as it does not have that chemical smell like many of the others.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I never eat my fruit or veggies with out washing them with this first.

customer_reviews.title: The best veggie wash!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite veggie wash. It doesn't have any kind of after taste like other products I've used (no matter how long you rinse them). Fit does a great job at cleaning the fresh fruits and vegetables. I highly recommend it. Everyone I've ever gotten to try it has become a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Technically I'm Allergic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Gave a bottle to my grand daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it to wash all my veggies prior to preparing them for the table. Excellent product. Gave a bottle to my grand daughter as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was so happy when they brought it back
customer_reviews.text: Used Fit for many years. Was so happy when they brought it back. Loved it!! Just purchased a new supply and the label now says "Organic". One problem, it now does absolutely nothing. I am devastated. Relied on this product to removed the chemicals, junk, wax, etc. It even cut the grease off cookware and the shmutz off my sunglasses. I guess I will now try Veggie Wash. You should be ashamed of yourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Arzounian

customer_reviews.title: Fit Fruit and Vegetable Wash
customer_reviews.text: I saw it on the television news and it was proven in labratory tests that it really works. I would reccomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A. Moak

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Fruit & Veges
customer_reviews.text: I really like cleaning my Veges & Fruit with FIT Wash, it rinses off really easy. Like the fact it is easy to order.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie L Leister

customer_reviews.title: Love this product - you can actually see the water ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - you can actually see the water color change when the chemicals from fruits and vegetables are washed!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I tend to use this product on almost all vegetables and fruits especially on apples and it definitely works. For the price you cant go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: SOAD

customer_reviews.title: Always In Use
customer_reviews.text: I buy organics when available, and try to stay away from the dirty dozen. But, I use this wash on any (even organic) produce that I purchase. Water is not enough. There are a couple of other washes in the market that may be as good, but this Fit Fruit and Vegetable Wash works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mareena

customer_reviews.title: fit evaluation
customer_reviews.text: i have used fruit wash before but not Fit. I like Fit and so do the people I have shared it with. i will buy more when mine runs out
customer_reviews.author: horace

customer_reviews.title: Packages Arrived Leaky, Amazon Kept Sending More Leaky Packages
customer_reviews.text: I have no way of knowing how well this product works on produce, since I've only received boxes with bottles with unscrewed tops, where the liquid had leaked out all over the interior packaging. When I reported this problem to Amazon, they sent another shipment that was packed the exact same way, even though I was very clear with the customer service rep that I really didn't want another mess on my hands. The packaging for these 12-ounce spray bottles seems much too flimsy to buy online. Many of the bottles and spray mechanisms were cracks when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of this after going apple picking and it works great at taking off the waxy coat on the outside of the apple. Much better than just normal soap. What else can i say? It does what it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid_Penguin

customer_reviews.title: This spray is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: just simply cannot have fruit without this. This spray is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Law

customer_reviews.title: FIT Fruit and Vegetable Wash - Victory At Seal Volume 1
customer_reviews.text: Fit Fruit And Vegetable Wash Spray Bottles - Have been using FIT for years and am pleased with it. Victory at Sea Volume I - Enjoyed Volumes 2-6 and should enjoy this one also.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: Who knew my fruit was this dirty? A few seconds after spraying Fit on the grapes, there was dripping dirt in the sink. The same thing was true with cherries. Rinsing fruit and vegetables with just water does not clean like a few sprays of Fit. The produce at my house is clearly cleaner for consumption--probably a whole lot healthier too.
customer_reviews.author: Galapagos

customer_reviews.title: DON'T EAT FRUIT AND VEGGIES WITHOUT FIT!!
customer_reviews.text: We've used Fit Vegetable Wash for many years and wouldn't be without it now. It takes off wax and grime easily but it's a bit difficult to find in our Oregon area. I love that Amazon carries it and it doesn't cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Wickiup

customer_reviews.title: Product better than the shipping
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Fit for a few years and like it. It takes the waxy coating off produce well and I hope it's doing as good a job with any pesticide residue. I just feel like the produce is cleaner when I use it. My only complaint this time was with the shipping. Though the bottles were in bubble wrap, all but one had become opened just the slightest bit so the wrap and bottles were all somewhat wet, and of course the bottles were no longer completely full.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My household cannot live without this in our kitchen. the bottle has a prominent place next to the kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Herrera

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love fit fruit and veggie rinse and was so upset when I could no longer buy it in the store. So glad to find it on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: katenalliesmom

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and convenient way to wash fruit and vegetables.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. I have used it since it was first on the market in the non spray form. Before I used soap and that is not as healthy nor as convenient as using this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Musil

customer_reviews.title: Yummy clean food
customer_reviews.text: I love how this cleans fruit and vegetables. You can feel and taste the difference. Just wish they sold it in more stores.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Extended the life of your food
customer_reviews.text: I would not dream of eating food without washing it with fit first. It truly helps keep fruit and vegetables fresh longer.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: It feels and smells totally different than what I had ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels and smells totally different than what I had before (must be fake products) Will not but it online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: supermom

customer_reviews.title: Our Go-To For Washing Our Fruit and Veggies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this nearly 5 years ago, but I felt like writing a review on it because we still use this brand today to wash our veggies and fruit. It helps gets all the extra junk off that simple rinsing won't get, but it uses gentle, nontoxic ingredients to do so. Rinsing with water often will not get nasty pesticides and other harmful bacteria/substances off your food when you are trying to prepare it. This is especially important when you are attempting to eat a lot of fresh, whole foods. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who eats and prepares a lot of produce for their meals in a healthy lifestytle.
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMyKids

customer_reviews.title: Good product..bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars not because of the product but because the package was received soaking wet because one bottle had almost completely spilled into the box appears the nozzle was defective and leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this product looking for a friendly bug spray. I had waxy leaf hoppers, and was looking for something to break down their waxy coat which makes them invincible and not be afraid of eating whatever I had sprayed with it. It seems to work on them after a few days. I then tried it on some store bought blueberries and I was amazed how clean the blueberries were. They were really dark color with all the residue removed. I don't think I'll eat blueberries without it again.
customer_reviews.author: doglar

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute BEST produce wash. It cleans efficiently with organic natural ingredients and rinses completely. I am always amazed at just how dirty the water is after using this product for a soak for lettuce especially. I highly recommend Fit Organic Produce Wash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Duke Blue Devil

customer_reviews.title: Four  thumbs up for this great grease cutter!
customer_reviews.text: This amazing fruit wash will remove all pesticides or sprays on your fruit and veggies in an organismic and healthy way. I also use it to wash dishes, scrub counters, clean pots and pans as a great grease remover and to clean my hands. An all round wonderful product to keep handy in the kitchen for daily use. Price is right and packaging is great!
customer_reviews.author: Magnoliaz

customer_reviews.title: cleaner which works, will buy again to clean fruits ...
customer_reviews.text: cleaner which works, will buy again to clean fruits and vegetables. I was surprised how much dirt I can was from grapes, apples and blueberries...

customer_reviews.title: makes vegies a little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like to use it to help rinse off all my fruits and vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other veggie wash products, especially the ones made with citrus..they only seem to take off the dirt, but not wax. What I really like about Fit is that it is all natural and it works. You only need a spray or two and rub for a second or two on the fruit or vegetable and the wax is gone! The only disappointment is that it comes in a smaller bottle than expected.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrime User

customer_reviews.title: Have used this for years. I put fruit or ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years. I put fruit or veggies in a salad spinner then rinse and dry.... bigg difference...so clean.. you can tell by looking at the water

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: It is the best fruit and veggie wash on the market!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... product where I always purchased it so I was happy to get more as I wash all my vegetables ...
customer_reviews.text: They quit selling this product where I always purchased it so I was happy to get more as I wash all my vegetables with it and feel that they are cleaner than just with water.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi (WV)

customer_reviews.title: Spray your veggies clean!
customer_reviews.text: I like Fit because it is not made with coconut oil, which I am alergic to. You spray it on, work it into the fruit or vegetable (depending on how delicate)wait a minute or two and rinse really well with cold water. It must work because my family and I are still alive with no upset stomachs. I've used this product for about a year. Maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Healthy choice
customer_reviews.text: It does what it is supposed to do, easily removes any coating and I assume therefore, all else. I gave 4 stars because without a microscope I cannot verify the last statemenet for myself☺!

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: Works OK...seems to be weaker solution than what I bought in local store.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.J.

customer_reviews.title: I guess it serves its purpose but I don't like the feel (greasy)
customer_reviews.text: I guess it serves its purpose but I don't like the feel (greasy). Easier to just use soap and water for peelable fruits.
customer_reviews.author: R. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: You have to use more product to get a good clean result
customer_reviews.text: It appears that the formula has changed. You have to use more product to get a good clean result. I may stop using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robb in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: I researched and was glad to have found this product
customer_reviews.text: Since the purchase of my Vita-mix I was looking for a way to clean my veggies. I researched and was glad to have found this product.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Product
customer_reviews.text: I started using it because I ordered it to ship to family member in Canada. Amazon does not ship this to Canada. As a result, I kept some to try and shipped the rest. I like it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Just wish it wasn't so hard to find...

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the next best thing to buying organic. Been a Fit user for a couple of years now.

customer_reviews.title: Based on the positive reviews, I switched from my ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on the positive reviews, I switched from my usual Amazon purchase f and v wash to this one. The mist made me cough each time I use it and the instructions indicated that you rub each item for one minute each applying the spray. No thanks. I gave a bottle to one of my friends, thinking perhaps I was sensitive to the product and it also made her cough.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara by the pond

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful vegetable wash. Also wonderful for removing food stains safely from clothes.

customer_reviews.title: FIT veggie and fruit wash.
customer_reviews.text: It is organic and it works to wash fruits and vegetables.

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have exceptionally sensitive taste buds and the only flavor Fit has would be a very subtle hint of lemon. One drop on an apple is all you need. You then just rub it all around the fruit and it's then germ free. This stuff will last a long time if one uses only what they need.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Logan

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This wash is great to use on soft fruits and veggie. In less than 20 seconds I can start to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product for washing fruit such as apples

customer_reviews.title: Nice, very mild fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fruit wash. It does the job of cleaning fruit and vegetables well and has a nice, very mild fragrance. Some other fruit washes have more of a caustic smell. The spray bottle is a real plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on all veggies and fruits from the store. Even fruits/veggies with tougher skins like avocados and apples.
customer_reviews.author: angelflight

customer_reviews.title: Glad to find in a multi pack
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find Fit Organic spray so I was happy to see I could buy them 6 at a time. No bad smell or taste left on fruits and vegetables!likenother fruit and veggie washes!

customer_reviews.title: it is a good product that I have been using for several years
customer_reviews.text: Package leaked. Otherwise, it is a good product that I have been using for several years, but has become hard to find locally.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, seems to work when I remember to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

product_meta.title: Fit Organic Produce Wash, 12 Oz Spray, Fruit and Vegetable Wash & Pesticide/Wax Remover (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Size:6-(Pack)You wash your hands before dinner. In most homes, it’s a standard practice. And just like you wouldn’t wash your hands with only water, the same should go for your fruits and vegetables. Those wondering how to wash fruit properly need only to turn to Fit Organic Fruit and Vegetable Wash, a trusted and certified organic produce wash. Fit Organic cleans 98% more waxes, pesticides, and other contaminants from your fruits and veggies than water alone. Produce is porous. That’s why water alone just won’t clean down into the many uneven bumps and grooves that coat your fruits and vegetables. While water can bead up ineffectively on the surface of your food, Fit Organic produce wash gets down into the fiber of the plant, removing any remaining wax and pesticides. If you want to know how to thoroughly wash pesticides off fruit in the safest manner, look no further than Fit Organic, the only USDA-certified organic and kosher (OU) fruit and vegetable wash. Fit Organic is the best way to wash fruit and vegetables. It’s more than just a name—Fit Organic is USDA-certified Organic and Kosher (Orthodox Union) and approved by the prestigious Oregon Tilth Company, which means our ingredients have been thoroughly vetted and shown to be truly organic, using no artificial chemicals or ingredients. Our products are also certified as vegan, kosher, and completely animal cruelty-free. Using Fit Organic’s fruit and veggies wash spray is as simple as can be: spray to cover produce, rub for about 1 minute and rinse under water. You’ll never have to worry about chemicals and contaminants again when you know how to properly wash fruit. Why would you use artificial chemicals to clean chemicals from your produce? Fit Organic is made from produce to clean produce and is the only Certified Organic and Kosher produce wash (Orthodox Union) available. We’re Nielson’s #1 market leader for a reason, buy some Fit Organic Fruit and Vegetable Wash today!
feature_bullets: USDA-certified Organic and Kosher (Orthodox Union) fruit and vegetable wash made with only wholesome, natural ingredients
Easy-to-use spray, made from food to clean food to ensure the cleanest fruits and vegetables for your family.
Fit Organic is Nielsen’s #1 Market Leader for fruit and vegetable washes. Not Animal Tested, No expiration date; product will not spoil
This vegetable and fruit wash removes 98% more pesticides and waxes than water alone.
Fit leaves no after taste or smell, unlike other fruit and veggie washes.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
